title: vAzhga shrI
sahitya:
vAzhga shrI aravindar vAzhga shakti annai vAzhgavE aruTkulamE


anupallavi

  shUzhga yOga vigjnAna shuDaroLi engumE sUriya jyOtiyaip-pOl enrum


caraNam    mAniDar deivikam Arudal aDaiyavE maunat-tavam purindAn
vAnara sAKSiyai maNmisai vaLarkkavE vANALellAm muyanrAn
pOnadu kaliyugam pUttadu puduyugam puNNiyam polindaduvE
